title: ‘I Will Try to Win the Tour de France Next Season’: Olympic Champ Pauline Ferrand-Prévot Quits MTB on Top
content:
Multiple world champion Prévot set to refocus on road scene, chasing the maillot jaune after many rainbow jerseys.

Read the full article at ‘I Will Try to Win the Tour de France Next Season’: Olympic Champ Pauline Ferrand-Prévot Quits MTB on Top on Velo.
author: sstokes
